string-array.name: peter_rabbit_2
string-array.item: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. \nBored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family.
Writers: Will Gluck, Patricj Burleigh, Beatrix Potter
Stars: Rose Byrne, Domhnall Gleeson, David Oyelowo
